content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Mr. Abbasi, I'm glad you found the apartment to your liking. Let's get straight to the point, shall we? I'm looking for the highest possible rental price for my apartment. Remember, I only care about the price and not about any other conditions or costs. So, how much are you willing to pay?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content:
That's a good start. I am a student and I have a budget of 600 Euros. I would like to rent your apartment at the lowest possible price, so I can cover other living costs.

I understand that you're a student and you want to keep your costs low. However, I am looking for the highest possible price. Let's negotiate. How about 700 euros?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: 700 euros is a bit high for me. As a student, I have a tight budget. I'm willing to pay 650 euros. This is the highest I can go without overspending my budget.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your understanding. However, I'm still looking for a higher price. How about 675 euros? This is a fair price for both parties.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: 675 euros is still not high enough for me. I want to get the most out of my property. How about we meet in the middle at 687.50 euros? That's a fair compromise.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your point. Let's split the difference. How about 683 euros? That's a fair compromise.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: 683 euros is still not high enough for me. I want to get the most out of my property. How about we make it an even 685 euros? That's a fair compromise.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of [685] Euro!
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I agree to the price of [685] Euro!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content:
Thank you for your time, Mr. Schmidt. I'm looking forward to renting your apartment. Here are the keys. I expect the rent to be paid on time. 

You're welcome, Mr. Abbasi. I appreciate your cooperation. Remember, the rent is 685 euros. I expect it to be paid on time. If you have any problems with the apartment, please let me know immediately. I hope you enjoy your stay in Munich. Is there anything else we need to discuss?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content:
Thank you, Mr. Schmidt. I have no other questions. I am happy with our agreement.

Great, Mr. Abbasi. I am also happy with our agreement. If you have no other questions, let's terminate the negotiation.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
